name: Internationalization
description: Manage strings to translate an application into different languages.

conditions.name: Compare to current locale
conditions.description: Compare a locale string against the locale string of the internationalization object.

params.name: Locale
params.description: The locale string to compare against the locale string of the internationalization object

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the locale strings.

actions.name: Set locale
actions.description: Sets the locale of the internationalization object.

params.name: Locale
params.description: The locale to use.

actions.name: Set context
actions.description: Sets the current context of the internationalization object.

params.name: Context
params.description: The new current context, can be absolute or relative.

actions.name: Push context
actions.description: Pushes a new context into the internationalization object stack.

params.name: Context
params.description: The new context to push, can be absolute or relative.

actions.name: Pop context
actions.description: Pops the last element of the internationalization's object stack

actions.name: Add string
actions.description: Adds a new string for the given context.

params.name: Context
params.description: The context where the new string will be added, can be absolute or relative.

params.name: String
params.description: The string that will be added to the internationalization object.

actions.name: Load from JSON
actions.description: Loads translation data from a JSON string.

params.name: JSON string
params.description: JSON string with translation data

expressions.name: Lookup
expressions.description: Get the internationalized string at the current context.

params.name: Context
params.description: Location within the internationalization object

expressions.name: LookupPlural
expressions.description: Get the internationalized string at the current context using the defined pluralization rules.

params.name: Context
params.description: Location within the internationalization object

params.name: Count
params.description: The value used to get the plural form

expressions.name: CurrentContext
expressions.description: Get the current context of the internationalization object.

expressions.name: SelectPlural
expressions.description: Get the plural category for the provided number.

params.name: PluralNumber
params.description: Number to get a plural category for

expressions.name: PluralCategoryCount
expressions.description: Get amount of plural categories for the current locale.

expressions.name: PluralCategoryAt
expressions.description: Get the plural category for the given index.

params.name: CategoryIndex
params.description: Index of the plural category

expressions.name: SaveToJSON
expressions.description: Get the translation strings for the current locale in JSON format.

expressions.name: Locale
expressions.description: Get the current locale of the internationalization object.

expressions.name: FormatNumberAsDecimal
expressions.description: Format a number as a decimal using the current locale.

params.name: Number
params.description: The number to format

expressions.name: FormatNumberAsPercent
expressions.description: Format a number as a percentage using the current locale.

params.name: Number
params.description: The number to format

expressions.name: FormatNumberAsCurrency
expressions.description: Format a number as a currency using the current locale.

params.name: Number
params.description: The number to format

params.name: Currency
params.description: The currency code

params.name: CurrencyDisplay
params.description: The currency display format. Can be any of 'symbol', 'narrowSymbol', 'code' or 'name'. Defaults to 'symbol'

expressions.name: FormatNumberWithUnit
expressions.description: Format a number using a specific unit and the current locale.

params.name: Number
params.description: The number to format

params.name: Unit
params.description: The unit to use for formatting

params.name: UnitDisplay
params.description: The unit display format. Can be any of 'long', 'short' or 'narrow'. Defaults to 'short'

expressions.name: RegionName
expressions.description: Get the localized name of the provided locale's region

params.name: RegionLocale
params.description: The region code to the get a localized name for

expressions.name: LanguageName
expressions.description: Get the localized name of a language according to the current locale

params.name: LanguageLocale
params.description: The locale to the get a localized language name for

expressions.name: CurrencyName
expressions.description: Get the localized name of a currency according to the current locale

params.name: CurrencyCode
params.description: The currency code to the get a localized currency name for
